Amiodarone side effects
Amiodarone is the AAD with most prominent toxic effects and its use is associated with numerous cardiac and extra-cardiac side effects, eventually leading to drug discontinuation in ∼29 % of patients during the first 3 years of treatment . The overview of most important adverse effects related to chronic amiodarone use is presented in Table 5.
